ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: You can find a snip of it on www.eqvault.com in the news. I know it was somewhere on the whineplay general forum, but with the servers currently down I can t
ygData.messageBody:
You can find a snip of it on www.eqvault.com in the news.
I know it was somewhere on the whineplay general forum, but with the
servers currently down I can't connect to it with all the traffic.

[Quote from original post: 4. When will the bard songs lullaby (AOE mes
song), chains (level 23 non-exploited snare song) and pixie strike (target
mes song) be fixed?]

Gord'o:
Ester is looking into lullaby and pixie strike, but we've had some other
things pop up over the past few weeks that have taken priority. Regarding
chains, it's working as it is supposed to. I understand that the claim is
that it doesn't work as well as it did before NPC change that wasn't
necessarily supposed to affect it, however upon looking into it we've
determined that the way it works now is sufficient for the spell.


At 11:27 AM 8/23/00 -0600, you wrote:
>Where did you see comments from GZ that she had been taken off? I missed
>them somehow.
>
> Kit
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 11:14 AM
>To: EQ Bards
>Subject: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
>
>
>I'm very annoyed by GZ's comments stating Ester was yanked from our problem.
>See this post
>http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/007440.html
>
>Thanks
>
>Slyde
